row.col: This article is as few or no other articles link to it. Please help in articles on related topics. (August 2008)''

bdy.p:
Clarified Networks is a company that is headquartered in
Oulu ,
Finland .

Clarified Networks has been working commercially since 2006. It is most famous for developing a commercial software called Clarified Analyzer (aka Tia). The research and development for their tools began in 2002 and continued for 4 years in the Oulu University Secure Programming Group (OUSPG) before Clarified Networks spinned from the research group in 2006.

Since 2006 Clarified Networks has in particular concentrated in developing the Collaborative focus in their products and currently refers to itself as a provider of Collaborative Network Analysis tools. Practical applications for Clarified Networks' tools are for example Traffic Auditing, Troubleshooting and Malware analysis.
